p: The total antioxidant activity of the 2 essential oils, 2 extracts, and rose water was measured by FRAP assay ( Figure 1). B persicum essential oil showed the greatest antioxidant activity (248.56 ± 1.09 µM Fe 2+/g). B persicum extract and E globulus essential oil were the least antioxidant activity. Overall, the total antioxidant activity ranked as follows: Bunium persicum essential oil > Eucalyptus globulus extract > rose water > Bunium persicum extract ≥ Eucalyptus globulus essential oil.
